description:
A little pouch that could be the difference between a great story and horrible story. The Scout Survival Pack can help you survive longer in an outdoor emergency. The lightweight, waterproof pouch is easy to pack and has room to add more gear to your survival kit.

  • Emergency blanket helps you stay warm, reflecting 90% of your body heat
  • Vacuum-metalized polyethylene won’t shred like Mylar®
  • Blanket printed with survival tips
  • Compact button compass
  • Fire Lite™ and Tinder Quik™ to start a fire in nearly any conditions
  • Tinder Quik is waterproof, extremely wind-resistant and burns for 2-3 minutes
  • Survival fishing kit includes line, hooks and small weights
  • Sewing needle and fishing line for repairs
  • Slim Rescue Howler™ 100dB whistle
  • Polycarbonate signal mirror can be seen for over 10km
  • Duct tape for everything from repairs to first aid
  • Roll-top waterproof bag
name: Survive Outdoors Longer Scout Survival Kit
